question:
Consider the following Web-Portals along with Ministries to which they are associated:
  1. MERIT- Ministry of Science & Technology
  2. ShaGun- Ministry of Human Resource & Development
  3. Nakshe- Ministry of Earth Sciences
Which of the above is/are correct?
explanation:
MERIT stands for Merit Order Despatch of Electricity for Rejuvenation of Income and Transparency. This portal has been developed by Ministry of Power in association with POSOCO and Central Electricity Authority. The MERIT Web portal displays an extensive array of information regarding the merit order of Electricity procured by State(s).
ShaGun web-portal is an initiative by the Ministry of Human Resource & Development. It aims to capture and showcase innovations and progress in Elementary Education sector of India by continuous monitoring of the flagship scheme-Sarva Shiksha Abhiyan (SSA).
The web portal “nakshe” was launched by the Ministry for Science & Technology to allow for the public easy access of the Open Series Maps (OSM) containing natural and man-made geographical features including terrain or topography.
